website_summaries.verdict: Although few pouches are included with purchase, this budget-friendly model is great entry-level machine.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty NOT valid if you open it!
customer_reviews.text: My laminator was working completely fine for about 10 uses, but when there was a blockage, I unscrewed the back to check out the problem. There was a sheet stuck that I wasn’t able to remove. So, I called customer support, told them the problem, and they said that since I opened the device, it was no longer protected under warranty. I find this to be completely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Harper

customer_reviews.title: Recommend AGAINST buying this laminator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laminator for light office use in August. It stopped heating up in December. I tried to get a replacement. They cancelled my replacement request because I bought the Protection Plan. When I looked up instructions for that, it said that I bought a Computer/Laptop. To summarize, I received a defective product, spend extra money on a worthless Protection Plan, and I have no way of talking to a live person to straighten this out. I recommend AGAINST buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these in a little over a year. I should have learned my lesson the first time. The first one I bought stopped feeding the paper / pouches through. This second one eats the pouches but they don’t come out the other side and get jammed in the machine. I’m just using regular thin copy paper. The back of the machine has completely melted. Save your money - this only lasted a few months and it’s already unusable.
customer_reviews.author: M.B., Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s only my first day of usage but already loving it! Heats up fast, great adhesion, no bubbles, what a score! I will say, though, that it’s got a distinct smell while it’s on, even prior to use. Hoping that’s normal but other than that, great price and great product. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Different Model Than Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product description shows this laminator, but then, you are sent a cheaper model. The model sent does not have a tray and the good buttons. I am very disappointed, because I was replacing my old laminator which was the same as the one in the picture. I loved it. I have tried others with new trays or no trays, and they have not been as good. I'm feeling a little like this is bait and switch!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Minard

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only used it for 2 days laminating about 20 sheets. 5mil setting for 3mil sheets melted the sheets- regular 3mil setting works just fine for 3mil sheets. Don’t know why some had to use higher setting for 3mil. Will update upon further use or problems. Used by primary school teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Smithsonite

customer_reviews.title: My precious......
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October of 2017. I use this very regularly, laminating all my educational resources for homeschooling. I've used lhe Amazon basic laminating sheets and a store on here called "packing supply" both at a 3 mil thickness. I've only had one jam and that was because I let my daughter feed it through lol but after I got it out, it still continues to work well and that happened in the early days of my laminating relationship. This thing has been a trooper. Very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good Price. Broke Before Second Use.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to laminate about 50 sheets of paper for a project, and planned to use it once or twice a year for little things, so the price was perfect. Did about 25 pages the first night; and it worked just fine. When I went to finish the other half, the feeder would not work. And even if I managed to get the paper in, it wouldn't feed through, it would just apply heat to the same spot. I remember the manual had a troubleshooting page but I had thrown it away, and I am entirely unable to find the manual online.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Sirma

customer_reviews.title: stopped feeding pouches after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended from other teachers, had decent reviews so I bought one. I don't know if they've modified the product in some way this past year but I used it two times, and the rollers started clicking. When this happens, it stops feeding the pouches. Very disappointed. Seems to have had wonderful reviews in the past and now reviews show real problems with the product. Too late to return ... I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wnyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and yet not worth what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Ten months after I bought this thing and after no more than a half-dozen uses, the element that heats the rollers to seal the laminating "pouches" quits. This is not a sophisticated machine--in fact, in a lot of ways, it's similar to a toaster. The thing was cheap, but I figured the brand name meant it would work satisfactorily if I were careful with it. No such luck. I thought at first that Scotch was selling the laminator cheaply and hoped to profit on sales of the pouches. Turns out it's the other way around--they must figure you'll have to buy a dozen of the laminators in order to use up an entire package of pouches.
customer_reviews.author: T. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Great for planner covers
customer_reviews.text: I use laminators to make 5 mil planner covers. I absolutely adored by old Scotch laminator. It was super cheap, and it worked very well... for two years. Then it died. I was pretty sad to discover it had been replaced by a newer model (this one). I've only used this new model once, but it laminated even cleaner than the old model. I was pleasantly surprised! The only thing I didn't like was the "burning plastic" smell that appeared about a minute after I turned it on. Hmmmm. I'll report back if things change, but for now, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CorriePDX

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, clear and flat laminations
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the extra few dollars over buying the Amazon one. I bought the Amazon one last year and have messed up so many laminations with it, constantly getting caught up and crumpled laminations. I just bought this official name brand laminator and am BLOWN AWAY by how much better it is than the amazon one. Every single lamination comes through beutifully and nothing has gotten caught so far. It is worth the extra money for the name brand one. If you are sitting there trying to decide between the two, go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Todaro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Trying to laminate something really close to my heart and i lost it :-(
customer_reviews.author: BoricuaSun

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: I received the laminator and used it once. After the second use the rollers stopped working. They just made a whirring sound. I contacted customer service and received a replacement. I recently opened the replacement, used it once and all went well. But, when I tried to use it again, I had the same problem. The rollers stopped working. I followed the directions, used the correct film, inserted it as directed. I could see if I had this problem once, but twice? Very poor quality. Luckily, I received a refund. I would not make the same mistake a THIRD time!
customer_reviews.author: ceegee

customer_reviews.title: Second Machine In One Month!
customer_reviews.text: The first machine I ordered stopped working after a week and I only used the machine for 3 or 4 laminated sheets. I returned the machine and ordered a replacement since I wanted to give it a second try, now a month after the second machine, it stopped working again and now I a can’t return. Just save your money and the trouble and buy a better machine. Buy a machine that can let you regulate temperature because this one is not that good For foils and buy a machine with a cold setting as well so you can use it for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer007

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This laminator is a PIECE OF CRAP. I wish I could give it ZERO starts but that isn't an option. I bought it at the end of September because it was on sale. I took it out of the box toward the end of October to use it and it absolutely wouldn't heat. There is no provision to return it. I see from other reviews that I am not the only one who has been ripped off by this product. Stay FAR AWAY unless you want to get your money stolen. So ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with 2 laminating sheets.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great, but it only came with 2 large laminating sheets. I laminated a paper membership card(small in size) and had to use a whole large sheet to do a little card. Seemed wasteful. The machine works as expected, just be sure to order extra laminating sheets with it.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Best for the price also! I’m a nursing student and use it for all my flash cards and projects. Also, I homeschool my 8 year old due to Covid-19 and these come in very handy! Ps: make sure you order extra laminating sheets because it only comes with two. Best Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mirona

customer_reviews.title: Love the laminator, hate the noise!
customer_reviews.text: The first Scotch laminator I purchased has gotten a lot of use. It is a quiet workhorse. This new one, same model, just gray is so loud it is really off putting!!! How can the same model have one super quiet and one so opposite? Rattle rattle rattle......rattle x 3.......rattle rattle rattle. I wonder if I was send a used one or one that was returned due to the noise. Either way, I am not happy. Sadly however, I cannot afford to return it. I guess next I should invest in some ear muffs. I love Scotch products normally, so this is an unexpected and undesired disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H.

customer_reviews.title: It gets very hot and has a smell but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Scotch Thermal Laminator, TL901C I've used another version of this Scotch laminator for years but it was owned by someone else. I decided to get one for myself. Just used it for two printer-paper-thick sheets and immediately I noticed that it has a smell (the older version did not) and gets hotter than I remember the other one getting. Still, the quality of the lamination is as expected, it was ready to use quickly and it got the job done. Will update review if anything else comes up. (ie - it ceases to function as some of the other reviews have noted (though possibly not for this model).)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed & “ain’t what she used to be”
customer_reviews.text: I have used Scotch Brand Laminators for about 15 years...this is my 3rd. I’m not impressed with the latest look as it’s much cheaper looking & lacks the great rear loading tray—now it has NO guidance tray & inputs from the front with the power switch inconveniently located in the rear. This is a very poor Re-design which cheapens the integrity of the device. I don’t know how long this one will last but I’m sure I’ll be shopping for a much better constructed replacement. And yes, it does smell while heating which my one purchased 5 years ago did not.
customer_reviews.author: VICKIE T

customer_reviews.title: Working very well
customer_reviews.text: Does a very nice job. We use it to laminate signs we print on standard printer paper for outdoor use at our business. Need to make sure sheets are aligned, etc. to get good quality, but easy to learn to use and get good quality. If posting outdoors, make sure staples, etc. penetrate only where the two sides of the laminating "envelopes" are sealed together. I made the error of stapling where the paper was, and during rain or snow, the moisture pentrates enough to make the sign get wet and cause ink to bleed..
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Warning - do a test run first!!!
customer_reviews.text: The laminator works great now that I figured out whether to push the #3 or the #5 button on top. It makes a huge difference! The 2 sample laminating sheets that come with the machine don't say whether they are 3ml or 5ml, so I selected #5 and completely ruined a piece of my child's art and a Gov't permit that I was trying to laminate. :( I should have done a tester first. Now I know to push #3 and it works great. The generic 100pc. Amazon laminating sheets work great with this.
customer_reviews.author: k stove

customer_reviews.title: Burned out After One Use
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 stars, if it were possible. I purchased this laminator earlier this year, and used it once for a work project which entailed laminating a mere 8 sheets. I haven't needed to use it since then. I just tried to use it. After laminating one sheet, it stopped working. I waited a week, went back to it, and its still doesn't work. My "window for returns" closed in April, unfortunately. I'm super upset and disappointed. How do I get this returned? I don't care how long I've had this for, I've only laminted 9 sheets before the heating unit burned out.... this is a product error, not a user error. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: RachelRane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to laminate some cheat sheets for photography for some time. Had this on my Christmas list and didn't get it so Merry Christmas to me! Was very very happy with the ease of use. Got Scotch pockets 4 x 6 to use because the sheets I wanted to laminate were a bit smaller than 4 x 6 " and it worked great. I believe they say to allow a minimum of 1/8" on each side. I had more at the top so punched holes and put these laminated sheets on a key ring. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: pdk

customer_reviews.title: Somethings not making sense
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find a compact laminating machine. In spite of the negative reviews, I gave it a chance. It literally gave out on me the first day of using it. I was so shocked it took me some time to even have the energy to put in for an return. Hopefully this company figure out the malfunction of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- lasted one month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on July 25th after man homeschool moms recommended it and the reviews were great. It is August 28th and it no longer works. Jump back on to find a ton of reviews from those experiencing what I am. FIND ANOTHER LAMINATOR!
customer_reviews.author: BrittAsh

customer_reviews.title: Works fine one week in
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a handful of times in the first week but it has performed 100% each time. I used the Scotch brand 3 mil sheets to make 8.5" x 11" sheets as well as cutting out essentially bookmarks from such sheets, and the edges of the full sheet as well as the cutouts are holding up just fine. I see reviews that complain about failure in under a year, so if that happens to me, I'll come back with an update. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Initial odors.
customer_reviews.text: Functional at a good price. For occasional laminating, should be all that's needed. One star off because of the initial fumes. Laminator generated a headache-inducing noxious odor similar to burning plastic the first time it was used (2 sheets). Powered off and cooled. Ran another 2 sheets the second session with some odor persisting. The next day a 10 sheet session was run with no offensive odor. Recommend running a couple of cycles outside to clear the fumes. Used Scotch brand thermal laminating pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Sf Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Laminate rolls into the machine!
customer_reviews.text: WORST laminators ever! I bought 2! One for my classroom and one for home because they were such a great price. I just started using them today and BOTH machines have had the paper roll inside the machine! My pages are ruined and now have to reprint I don't know how many pages. I figured, that could happen occasionally, but not on the 1st day I used them! BOTH machines have had this happen. I've had several laminators over the years and never have had this happen within the 1st year let alone the 1st day of use!
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laminator and it ended up in the trash the 3rd time I tried to use it. The pouch for some reason wrapped around the roller. When I tried to use the reverse button not only was it flimsy but it didn’t work. And, this is not a device that can be taken apart to remove anything from the rollers. The area where the off and on button is had a plastic cover on it that was buckled up. I will be looking for a better made laminator next time. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped heating up. Useless now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in 2017. Didn’t open it and use it until 2018 for small keepsakes. Worked great, but stopped heating up and “Ready” indicator stopped lighting up. Really disappointed that I used it less than 10 times and now it’s broken. I want a refund or a new product sent. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBird

customer_reviews.title: Portable,  light weight - a must-have for all parents
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. I used the Amazon brand laminator before and comparing to this, this worka much better. We have been making bookmarks, reusable calendars, cerrificates. Make sure you patiently wait for the laminator to preheat itself. It takes about 3-5mins when it has been idled. In between, you may need to stop for a minute or so to re-heat it again. Pros: - light weight - portable - easy to use (dummy friendly) - perfect for certificates, crafts bookmarks, pictures - good value Cons: - it does have little, very little, smell from the hear or plastic whatsover, which I think it is very understanding
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: everyone show have this
customer_reviews.text: For the price, we all should have one. I hate it when I get those little paper membership cards (one time) that are supposed to last you for a long time and then crumble in your wallet. This is the answer. You can do a dozen at a time. Other advantage was using on a photo print (to paper) that my grandson wanted to use on his school binder. There a many uses, more than you might think of until you get one. Have to practice once or twice on something you don't care about until you get the hang of feeding it with the envelope containing your item (seals both sides and edges)
customer_reviews.author: Gdshort

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me then you extensively read reviews before making a purchase and just one bad review can make you second guess making the purchase. Don't!! This works perfectly and is easy to use! I laminated about 26 individual items and they all came out seamless. Such a great price and it alleviated the stress of having to return to school to laminate knowing that many other teachers will be doing the same. Don't let those few bad reviews distract you!
customer_reviews.author: dmclyn

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: Used this machine for laminating school items. It did not last more than a couple of weeks. It began to jitter and thump and eventually would not pull the lamination pouch through the rollers. My guess is that something is misaligned with the rollers. I used it for laminating small bulletin board items and name tags. It had gentle, but consistent use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pinklemonade

customer_reviews.title: What can I laminate next?
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter loves doing workbooks so I bought this laminator and dry erase markers so she can do them over and over again. Super easy to use. Heats up fast. I was concerned with my shaky hands that papers wouldn't feed straight but even when I've been a little off center it still comes out perfect. One of my favorite new toys. Saving myself on workbooks as well so it paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: step stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use....Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laminator. It's doing exactly what I want it to do. What I like: great price, no problems yet.... If I have to complain about something: sometimes, one of the corners of my laminated project might curve upward slightly. Overall, my first experience with a laminator has been very positive. It's easy to use and it's simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laminated well
customer_reviews.text: But it bothered me that the power button was cheaply covered by a sticker. As the laminator heated up, the sticker lost it's adhesion and peeled off. Then I could see directly into the machine. That's just cheap design. So I returned and got the Amazon Basics laminator, but then that machine stopped working after 10 pages and curled/ruined pages. So maybe I should have kept the Scotch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable thermal laminator used for 9 years in an office setting
customer_reviews.text: In use for over 9 years in an office setting -- this thermal laminator has held held up well. A simple design with few moving parts or wear points has resulted in a reliable product. It is simple to operate: turn the power on, select the mil size of the laminate, and wait for the device to reach proper temperature. The process is not complicated and nor should it be....it just works. We've used it with both 3 and 5 mil sheets (8.5 x 11) and small 'business card' size laminating sheets. All have worked well and no issues with bubbling or unsealed areas.
customer_reviews.author: PharmaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - cheap to protect the worth of my child's artwork!
customer_reviews.text: Great and so cheap compared to what you but in stores. It takes a few minutes to heat up and the roll speed is perfect. Seals great and is slow enough to where I can readjust things as needed. Using it primarily to protect artwork my little one has made as I'm a sucker for keepsakes. I've been using sheet protectors but the art work is warping with time (folding since it's paint). This is perfect to keep everything flay and protected. And what's best is that I can put it on the fridge for display without worrying about damage!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for some activity sheets and I have had great luck with it so far. Definitely worth it for the low price. Make sure to keep an eye out for the light letting you know it has reached the needed heat to start. Using it immediately is what causes bubbles and warping. 10/10 recommended. This is also compatible with the amazon brand laminate sheets!
customer_reviews.author: SS.DEB

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger items but not small pictures
customer_reviews.text: For laminating larger items this is great. The quality of the lamination is great, my gripe is with the fact that it doesn’t have a tray to keep your sheet flat as it goes into the machine. If you’re laminating smaller pictures, you may want to look for one work the tray so the pictures don’t shift. If you’re laminating bigger items then this one would work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Super simple - better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! For years I have been using a different brand (made by your's truly) and you can only send 1 sheet every 2 minutes or so, or it overheats. When this happened it would curl the corners and wouldn't be worth it. BUT THIS PRODUCT IS THE BOMB!!! I fed 11 sheets all back-to-back and everyone was done perfectly and the machine never overheated. Very happy with this purchase! I purchased Amazon brand lamination sleeves, and was very happy. Just plug-in, let it warm up and get to laminating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arival
customer_reviews.text: When I received the device I noticed the tell tell sound of rattling parts. As expected the laminator had either been shipped broken or was mishandled in en route to my residence. Luckily it was rather inexpensive and was easy enough to replace at my local hobby store. I needed one for a time sensitive project so that was the easier option.
customer_reviews.author: dwilson

customer_reviews.title: Almost started afire.
customer_reviews.text: Started smoking and I looked and there was a hole burned into base. It almost started a fire. I emailed 3 times to amazon about this and Go No Reply. I guess I’m out $38. Shame on you Amazon for Not Doing The Right Thing.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Scotch laminator
customer_reviews.text: So, I actually use this laminator a lot. It's my second Scotch laminator and I am impressed with the workload these laminators can handle. However, I am bummed that this one has melted. I am a teacher and can't afford a new one, so I still use it even though it's melted. It works and continues to laminate, I just can't leave it on and unattended because it does randomly start smoking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Love

customer_reviews.title: Not happy-broke in 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased late September 2018 when my previous one stopped working. Previous one also Scotch from Amazon worked for 3 years. This unit had far less use than my first one and it has stopped working in less than a year. It started making a clicking sound before school was out for summer...but still worked. Got a couple uses out of it in August and now it clicks and won’t accept a paper. It really has minimal use compared to my previous one that lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: oddtuba

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a while, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laminator. At first. It worked extremely well, was super easy to understand (what's not to understand? Power on / off, that's it). I had only used it lightly (less than once a week for small jobs only) and it started to jam. The laminator tries to back out the item being laminated, even when it's only paper thin. A single piece of paper in a pouch would jam 6-10 times. Now it rolls crooked even when being fed the pouch extremely carefully, so the item comes out wrinkled and unusable. I'll be buying a different brand as replacement. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: m douglas

customer_reviews.title: Sick of sorting through the recycling bin?
customer_reviews.text: Got lazy neighbors in your building? You're the only one with any sense of responsibility? Put them on notice that their careless tossing of their trash in the recycling dumpster is out of line and under surveillance with your own very official looking laminated signs. The stress relief is boundless.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this laminator. I can’t Imagine a laminator working any better! I like that I have the option for 3 and 5 plastic sleeves. I have only used the 5 and they look great. My signs are hung outdoors—and I will admit that after it rains, water usually does seep in and the paper inside gets all blurry, so I just lami are another one. Apparently some laminators jam. Not this one. Get it—-quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lo F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It was super helpful in laminating small projects for my classroom. It does say on the back to stop use after one hour of it being on for it to cool, which is understandable. I think it’s the perfect little laminator for home use.... and you can’t beat the price. I got the amazon basic laminator sheets with this and they work great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I've used this laminator fairly often for light, home and office uses. I've never misfed the pouches, dropped the unit, or otherwise mishandled it in any way. After less than two years, it just stopped working without any warning. It heats up and indicates the unit is Ready, but pouches will not feed and there is a clicking/popping sound from inside the unit. There is also a strong burning smell that makes me uneasy. I've unplugged it and thrown it away and will not be buying another Scotch Thermal Laminator.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great economy device for teachers on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine for my classroom needs. In response to other reviews describing curling when using pouches, I had a similar experience and realized the root of the problem. If you use a pouch that is too large and do not push the paper all the way to the sealed end, the ends will curl up. The machine is melting the laminating pouch, so it is important to use the correct size and the results will be excellent! Love my new machine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kinkopf

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine for the price. Needed to make menus for our new grill setup at our bar, felt laminating would be a good paper saving idea. Didn’t want to invest a lot of money in a laminator so went for this one. Right out of the box it worked perfectly, and was very easy to use. Used the 2 Scotch pouches that were included they worked flawlessly. Then I switched to the Amazon Basic pouches I purchased and they worked just as well! Hoping it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: cindrloo

customer_reviews.title: Broke down within 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that only after 7 months and 1/4 of 100 sheets of laminate leftover (so I used it less than 100 times is what I’m disappointed about) that the rollers did not work any longer. One day it just wouldn’t release the product and it remained inside the casing rolling over and over and becoming lodged inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is a game changer. I am literally laminating everything in my house, driving everyone crazy :) it is so convenient and portable. Takes less than 5 minutes to heat up. I absolutely love this laminator! Side note- Amazon laminating sheets work perfect in this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I had another Scotch laminator for over 7 years and it finally died on me. So, I looked on Amazon for a new one. I found this one. I am a teacher and needed a laminator to complete small projects. I don't use it often, but this one stopped feeding the paper through after a few uses. Now, I have to purchase a new one. I will not be purchasing another one like this one.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Melted!
customer_reviews.text: This laminator worked well for a few uses, but all of a sudden it made a clicking noise while laminating, and then melted the entire back. It will not run items through anymore and is too hot to touch. I should have known the price was too good to be true. I love scotch brand laminators usually, but this one was disappointing. There is no option to return this item either.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for happiness!
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT not buy this again or recommend to anyone. I am laminating the ABC’s. 1 letter per page and about half of the pages have 2 or more corners bent. Yes, it is cheap but u get what u pay for!! AND this is my 2nd machine!! I had to return the first bc it immediately started jamming/ backing up which ruins the item u are laminating!! BOO! If you only need it sometimes, and don’t care if pages are bent then this is your machine!
customer_reviews.author: Aveilhé

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this for the first time but it was a disaster! I inserted the pouch straight but it somehow didn't feed right so it wouldn't come out the other end. After it was finished feeding, I had to forcefully pull the page out of the machine. How useless!
customer_reviews.author: K. Nemanic

customer_reviews.title: It’s been a great addition!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this around the house and for home school (pandemic school) projects. I haven’t used a whole pack of laminate sheets yet, but no issues so far. For the price and quality, I think it’s a great tool to have at home. You can just plug it in and be done in a few minutes. For this reason I’d recommend it as a tool for teachers that work in a school with a shared laminator. It would be useful to have in the classrooms for those last-minute projects, but I think the smaller size would make it too tedious to use for everything.
customer_reviews.author: The Forresters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed! I bought this to use as my “school” laminator, because I have a different version at home. I opened it and used it for the first time on 7/26. By 7/31 it was putting ripples in my work and I would have to run items through more than once. Several times over the last 2 weeks it would try to crinkle up and get stuck, here or there and then yesterday evening it did this!!! All that’s left of my item is what you see the rest is wrapped around in the inside of the laminator and would not come out with the release button. I haven’t even had it a month and it broke. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Haley

customer_reviews.title: Beats Office Supply Store Laminating
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get a few things laminated at our local office supply store, but I decided instead to just DIY with this guy. So I ordered it and a stack of 3mm laminating pouches. I made the right choice. The value here is super high and I can do it at home. Fun not just for laminating things that really need it, but for fun projects with the family as well. For example, we made some bookmarks and laminated them.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Love my first one so....Bought a second one to keep at school.... heating element went out after using twice. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cjo1012

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: The machine jammed after 5 uses and can no longer be used. This seems to be a common problem. There should be a way to open the laminator and fix it, but it requires a lot of work and invalidates any warranty. In my opinion, it's junk and should be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a catch
customer_reviews.text: Its a trap, they only give you 2 or 3 laminating plastics, and you would have to buy your own after that, also, seems like it takes a while to heat up, i had to use a whole laminating paper, even for a small sized paper lamination. Would i recommend? Not really.
customer_reviews.author: Sujan Gautam

customer_reviews.title: Works great but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after only a few uses. Not pleased, it heats well, laminates well, but it stopped feeding the film through and I had to keep pulling it. Unfortunately, it started messing up after the window to send it back had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Bri “What Bri’s Cooking” Harris

customer_reviews.title: be careful as it eats foil, glad I didn't spend more
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly sure it's the laminator's fault but do be careful if you are using this to foil. It will eat foil and there's no way to release it off the rollers. Had to toss it in the garbage after 2 days of use. It also didn't seem to have that much of a heat difference between the two settings. If you're using for just basic lamination reasons this should work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chamele

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine the majority of the time. But occasionally it will kink or fold my top edges of my project. Really frustrating. Thankfully on this picture, it didn’t ruin my paper, but on others it has.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermal laminator
customer_reviews.text: Biggest complaint is that 3M only provides 2 sheets for thermal use. LOL That was the first thing I did. Order Amazon thermal sheets. Finished sealed item is tight and snug. Easy to trim edges. Suggest putting several items in a thermal sheet and running in the machine as it can get pretty expensive using an entire sheet for something as small as a library card.
customer_reviews.author: G. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this laminator 5 stars because it has worked efficiently for me over and over again since I purchased it. Here are the benefits of it: --it's very quiet when laminating --doesn't take a long time to warm up or cool back down I'm a school teacher and I've used this to laminate many class materials, now everything is sturdier and prettier for my classroom. My only suggestion is that you make sure your paper/plastic pouch is straight as it enters because the machine doesn't self-correct or adjust crocked papers; I made this mistake once and it came out wrinkly. Other than that, everything is great with this machine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya G. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Thermal Laminator so I don't know what other ones are like but this is great. Works effortlessly. Nothing to figure out other than here is the slot, put in the laminate sheet and watch it laminate in seconds. Every single one came out perfect. Love it. I can't tell you how nice it is to see a product work and not have to pull your hair out to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lee

customer_reviews.title: spend more money and get a better one
customer_reviews.text: first time I used it there was a quality control form from the factory that clogged up the exit and overheated the laminator. The form had a picture of an Asian Family which was a nice touch but it clogged it all up. I don't recommend using it for anything you don't want to get ruined. Ok for insurance cards, registrations etc because it ate up my Ronald Reagan picture
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Output
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for personal creations. Bookmarks using personal photos of our retirement community campus and important trips we have made are the creations so far. The bookmarks are photos on each side of the paper to be laminated, so two pieces. Works perfectly. Sure we will find more uses and enjoy the results very much. The price is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Knight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, professional results
customer_reviews.text: I needed twenty 5x7 placards laminated, for my daughter’s horse barn. Purchasing this was faster (next day delivery) , easier (dropped at my door vs driving 18 miles to a store) and more economical (store quoted me $ 27 for job & needed 48 Hr turn around time— 36 miles x 2 trips) . WELLLLLLL worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah May Winton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased this product twice. It has broken both times. This last time was just outside the Amazon warranty. The first one lasted about 6 months. We only use it once or twice a month at most. I guess for something cheap it's ok. But, Im now getting something better.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. It was basically 'plug and play'. You plug it in, wait for the light to come on and you're ready to go. I followed the recommended tips and in no time had 25 sheets laminated perfectly. It is big enough to handle standard products, but the design is trim, so it won't take much space to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last long- only had this for about a year and it stopped working. I don’t do a whole lot of laminating just maybe a few times a month for kids projects I want to keep. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy my own laminator for home because someone stole the one at work (selfish). BUT after using this one it's way better than others that I've used at work! Very happy to own this one. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Happy Teacher!!!!🍎
customer_reviews.text: I just unboxed it and started using right away. This is my first laminator and day one I laminated 100 pages non-stop! (#teacher) love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shey007

customer_reviews.title: Professional look on a bargain budget
customer_reviews.text: Laminated a few signs for my business and they look amazing. This laminator is easy to use. It's basically 3 steps: turn it on, choose thickness of the lamination, and then insert lamination in the machine. My signs have been out the rain without the sign bleeding ink so the laminator made a good seal all the way around the paper.
customer_reviews.author: G1001000

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy - Easy & Afforadable!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a laminator so that I could do at home laminating for things in my classroom. I was a bit hesitant to buy one for home, but with the scotch laminator I am so glad that I did! It’s so easy to use and for the price I am extremely satisfied! Wait about three minutes for the machine to heat up, put your material in the laminating pouch, and feed it through. One suggestion is to wait 2-3 min before adding another pouch! I bought the Amazon pouches and they work great with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: DDHZ31394

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great results
customer_reviews.text: I received my laminator yesterday and laminated my first project today- so far, I am very impressed! It was easy to use, heated quickly and had no problems. I do recommend using it on a flat surface with no interfering areas in the output space in the back. I could see that causing a jam. Anyway, I purchased this at $21.99, so I felt like it was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: a teacher without like a laminator...
customer_reviews.text: With schools closed since March, I had so many items that I needed laminated but couldn't access the one at school. The Scotch Thermal Laminator works so nicely with the thermal pouches I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S

customer_reviews.title: The best thing a teacher can ask for!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been missing. Trekking over to Lakeshore to do mass lamination wasn't an option when I moved so I needed my own and this one has been great. I noticed the bottom has melted which I am concerned about but I did use it on my couch so perhaps that is why. It still works great! I am very happy and so are my students because their learning materials last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Scott

customer_reviews.title: Buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect so much for so little money. This thing is absolutely amazing and a great value! Don’t hesitate buy it today! I also separately bought the 3 mL Scotch brand extra laminating sleeves and loved the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kristine White

customer_reviews.title: Wait awhile for warm up
customer_reviews.text: My spouse used this and said it took forever to heat up, also said he had to run the sheet through about 6 times for lamination to work. He was not impressed but I think for the price and no more than we will use this, it is fine. I just wanted one in case we needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Pickyone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the scotch thermal laminator. I was skeptical because of some of the reviews. I’m so glad I bought it! I home school 3 children and we use abeka curriculum I laminate everything from practice writing sheets, to projects, to our behavior chart and months for our classroom calendar. It’s been the best investment so far!
customer_reviews.author: Photo.Mom61

customer_reviews.title: Great compact laminator
customer_reviews.text: My laminator finally died and I purchased this because it was recommended through Amazon. I can honestly say that I have not been disappointed. It heats up quickly and laminates well on the first pass. I remember my first laminator being much more expensive, but so far this one has done an exemplary job for a fraction of the cost. It is easy to use while preserving photos and ID badges.
customer_reviews.author: MTTHOUGHTO

customer_reviews.title: Over heats and needs cooldown period
customer_reviews.text: It did the job well but it does have over heating problem where you can't use it to laminate things back to back. You have it give it time to cool down before continuing.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Made distance learning a bit easier for my kindergartener. Working from a 3 hole folder with sheet protectors was frustrating to erase. Not to mention hard to write on when its in the middle of the folder clasp. So i decided to purchase this so that i could laminate his sheets to make it easier to access and clean.
customer_reviews.author: BoricuaBarbie909

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly so excited to have this! As a student studying to be a teacher this will be and already has been handy! But do yourself a favor and buy the amazon basics laminating pouches!! The scotch pouches are thin and flimsy and warped really badly. The amazon pouches do not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this! I needed to protect my notes for school that I am going to be referencing constantly. It’s cheap and easy to use. I used the two sheets of 3mil laminator sheets the machine came with, and I had bought some 5mil sheets; they both worked great! No problems with either. If you follow the directions, it gives you no problems. As long as you wait for it heat up properly and are feeding the sheets in the correct way and gently, it will laminate anything you want easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Mooneyham

customer_reviews.title: Great Laminator
customer_reviews.text: This laminator has been great. It's easy to use and heats up quickly. I've used it for several projects and it's only wrinkled up one piece of paper. It smells pretty strongly when it's on, but I'm assuming all laminators smell like that and it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: lrgreen

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a month
customer_reviews.text: 6 weeks after purchase and in the middle of using it, it became too cool to seal pouches. Turned it off and on again. The power and 5mil lights turned on, but it never got hot again. It did not even survive the pack of 100 pouches I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Royer

customer_reviews.title: Won't work.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to laminate 3 paper items upon going to use it a fourth time it won't turn on. I've tried it in multiple outlets to be sure and nothing. Horrible. It should have lasted years, not 3 uses
customer_reviews.author: T. West

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model for over four and a half years. My last one finally died due to my 7-year-old putting a pouch in backwards. Otherwise, I had zero problems and have laminated thousands of pages. If this one holds up half as well as the last I’ll be very happy! Such a great value for high quality, durable laminating.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Be

customer_reviews.title: Triple check pouch is inserted the right way!
customer_reviews.text: Triple check that the sealed end of laminating pouch is entered first, because if you accidentally put the other end in first....you have a split second to release it; and if that second passes, you cannot retrieve it. Called 3M and representative said it’s broken now, “you can try taking it apart, to get you paper back, but once it’s so far in, it’s gone.” I did take it apart and was not able to retrieve my paper. I used it once and this happened, so again check that it’s inserted the right way or you’ll need another laminator.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The same as the others
customer_reviews.text: I have the step up from this one that I use in my classroom, this one I purchased for home! Same quality! I almost like this one better because it doesn't have a tray. Heats up fast, laminates easily. I only use Scotch brand pockets.
customer_reviews.author: emily anne

product_meta.title: Scotch Thermal Laminator, 2 Roller System for a Professional Finish, Use for Home, Office or School, Suitable for use with Photos (TL901X)
product_meta.description: Style:Laminating MachineThis is a thermal laminator that will laminate items up to 9 inch wide. It is a 2 roller system that has two temperature settings. It is photo quality and will laminate Up to 5 mil thickness pouches.
feature_bullets: Laminates Items up to 9 inches wide
Two roller system with two temperature settings
Will laminate pouches up to 5 mm thick
This laminating machine has an updated color and finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,932 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
